      org.apache.solr.update.SolrIndexWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, TwoPhaseCommit
public class SolrIndexWriter
extends IndexWriter

An IndexWriter that is configured via Solr config mechanisms.

Since:
solr 0.9
